name: Crystal Towers (Jam Version)
description:
Welcome to our game!!!

                 

Capture the crystal towers to reconnect the kingdom with mana, a strategic resource spent to build your forces and upgrade. 

Hold as much resource while surviving against the growing horde and reach a certain time to win the game!

You have 5 lives , use them wisely as the moment 5 enemy gets past the gate ..

YOU WILL LOSE!!! 

HAVE FUN :D 

There are a few bugs & missing features here and there 

(Note: Shock & Upgrade Armor do not work)

CONTROLS:

Left/Right Arrow: Pan Camera

Shift: Boost Camera Speed

Team

Programmer : Debuking , Cakeflurry

Artist : Cakeflurry 

Assist : RTHiro

PS. 

Unfortunately we did not manage to implement a bunch of features into this submission (joined on the 17th as a weekend jam), if you are interested, we are continuing on an improved version: https://debuking.itch.io/crystal-towers 

Here we have added some more intended features and will continue to update upon this with the feedback that we gain from this jam!

Thank you for playing our game!!
